raw_response: {"answer_index": 3, "answer_text": "Oral mifepristone + misoprostol", "confidence": 9, "reasoning": "This patient is approximately 8 weeks pregnant (4 weeks of missed menses + 4 weeks from LMP). Manual vacuum aspiration is also acceptable but medical abortion is preferred at this early gestational age when available. D&E is typically used for second-trimester terminations (>13-14 weeks).
